amendment.description: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 113-170 to make available from amounts available for the Department of Defense for research, development, test, and evaluation $10,000,000 for applied research to improve the safety of advanced batteries, specifically lithium-ion (Li-ion) batteries.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Pocan amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Pocan.
